1.1.name: wordpress/websitealive
1.1.description: WebsiteAlive is the easy-to-use Live Chat/Click-To-Call solution for your Wordpress website. Visitors can immediately chat or initiate a click-to-call session with someone at your company who can answer their questions, in real-time. This Wordpress plug-in instantly updates your Wordpress site with WebsiteAlive Tracking Code which tracks visitors in real-time and also displays a call-to-action icon.
